results.title: The Weekenders
results.creator_credit: Wang Film Productions and Steve Lyons
results.brief_description: The Weekenders is a Disney animated series about the weekend life of four diverse 7th graders: Tino Tonitini, Lorraine McQuarrie, Carver Descartes, and Petratishkovna Katsufrakis, voiced by veteran cartoon voice-actors: Jason Marsden, Grey DeLisle, Phil LaMarr, and Kath Soucie, respectively. It is stated at least once that the four main characters are each twelve years old. The setting is the fictional town of Bahia Bay, California. The show was created by Doug Langdale, later creator of Disney Channel’s Dave the Barbarian.

results.title: The Way of the Gun
results.creator_credit: Christopher McQuarrie, Maia Javan and Kenneth Kokin
results.brief_description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Christopher McQuarrie, Maia Javan and Kenneth Kokin
results.description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

results.title: The Usual Suspects
results.creator_credit: Bad Hat Harry Productions, Blue Parrot Productions, Bryan Singer, Christopher McQuarrie, Michael McDonnell, Howard Cummings, Louise Mingenbach and Kenneth Kokin
results.brief_description: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bad Hat Harry Productions, Blue Parrot Productions, Bryan Singer, Christopher McQuarrie, Michael McDonnell, Howard Cummings, Louise Mingenbach and Kenneth Kokin
results.description: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist that ended with an explosion in San Pedro harbor – leaving few survivors. Verbal lures his interrogators with an incredible story of the crime lord’s almost supernatural prowess.
description_for_label: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist that ended with an explosion in San Pedro harbor – leaving few survivors. Verbal lures his interrogators with an incredible story of the crime lord’s almost supernatural prowess.

results.title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
results.creator_credit: Parc Film, Madeleine Films, Beta Film, Jacques Demy, Bernard Evein, Jacqueline Moreau, Gilbert de Goldschmidt, Mag Bodard and Pierre Lazareff
results.brief_description: This simple romantic tragedy begins in 1957. Guy Foucher, a 20-year-old French auto mechanic, has fallen in love with 17-year-old Geneviève Emery, an employee in her widowed mother’s chic but financially embattled umbrella shop.

constellations_other.name: All about Agnes
constellations_other.description: Belgian director Agnes Varda was the only female director in the French New Wave movement and is known for her long career across influential documentary and dramas, and for her trademark humour, curiosity and insight.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Parc Film, Madeleine Films, Beta Film, Jacques Demy, Bernard Evein, Jacqueline Moreau, Gilbert de Goldschmidt, Mag Bodard and Pierre Lazareff
results.description: This simple romantic tragedy begins in 1957. Guy Foucher, a 20-year-old French auto mechanic, has fallen in love with 17-year-old Geneviève Emery, an employee in her widowed mother’s chic but financially embattled umbrella shop. On the evening before Guy is to leave for a two-year tour of combat in Algeria, he and Geneviève make love. She becomes pregnant and must choose between waiting for Guy’s return or accepting an offer of marriage from a wealthy diamond merchant.
description_for_label: This simple romantic tragedy begins in 1957. Guy Foucher, a 20-year-old French auto mechanic, has fallen in love with 17-year-old Geneviève Emery, an employee in her widowed mother’s chic but financially embattled umbrella shop. On the evening before Guy is to leave for a two-year tour of combat in Algeria, he and Geneviève make love. She becomes pregnant and must choose between waiting for Guy’s return or accepting an offer of marriage from a wealthy diamond merchant.

results.title: The Umbrella Academy
results.creator_credit: Kevin Lafferty, Sneha Koorse, Jamie Neese and Jason Neese
results.brief_description: A dysfunctional family of superheroes comes together to solve the mystery of their father’s death, the threat of the apocalypse and more.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kevin Lafferty, Sneha Koorse, Jamie Neese and Jason Neese
results.description: A dysfunctional family of superheroes comes together to solve the mystery of their father’s death, the threat of the apocalypse and more.

results.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
results.brief_description: A Texas Ranger hunts for a hooded serial killer terrorizing the residents of a small town, set in 1946 Arkansas. Loosely based on a true story.
results.description: A Texas Ranger hunts for a hooded serial killer terrorizing the residents of a small town, set in 1946 Arkansas. Loosely based on a true story.
description_for_label: A Texas Ranger hunts for a hooded serial killer terrorizing the residents of a small town, set in 1946 Arkansas. Loosely based on a true story.

results.title: The Town that Dreaded Sundown
results.brief_description: A masked maniac terrorizes the same small community where a murderer known as the Phantom Killer struck decades earlier.

constellations_other.name: Thomas Edison
constellations_other.description: Thomas Edison helped establish cinema as an art-form and mass entertainment. Many of his early films were short and showed everyday activities like riding a bicycle.

results.description: A masked maniac terrorizes the same small community where a murderer known as the Phantom Killer struck decades earlier.

results.title: The Time Tunnel
results.creator_credit: Irwin Allen Productions and Irwin Allen
results.brief_description: The Time Tunnel is a 1966–67 US color science fiction TV series, written around a theme of time travel adventure.

constellations_other.name: Perception, time and flickering images
constellations_other.description: Using a peep hole and a loop of rotating still images, mutoscopes control the point of view of the audience while also creating the illusion of depth. Filmmakers have since put optical tricks to work creating surreal scenes.

results.description: The Time Tunnel is a 1966–67 US color science fiction TV series, written around a theme of time travel adventure. The show was creator-producer Irwin Allen’s third science fiction television series, released by 20th Century Fox and broadcast on ABC. The show ran for one season of 30 episodes. Reruns are viewable on cable and by internet streaming. A pilot for a new series was produced in 2002, although it was not picked up.
description_for_label: The Time Tunnel is a 1966–67 US color science fiction TV series, written around a theme of time travel adventure. The show was creator-producer Irwin Allen’s third science fiction television series, released by 20th Century Fox and broadcast on ABC. The show ran for one season of 30 episodes. Reruns are viewable on cable and by internet streaming. A pilot for a new series was produced in 2002, although it was not picked up.

results.title: The Time Travelers
results.brief_description: A time travel experiment that was supposed to produce a window into time turns out to be a portal instead. One of the experimenters steps through into a not-too-distant-future world that has been destroyed by nuclear war.

constellations_other.name: Colour and illusion
constellations_other.description: Exploring the science of colour, light, reflection and movement.

results.description: A time travel experiment that was supposed to produce a window into time turns out to be a portal instead. One of the experimenters steps through into a not-too-distant-future world that has been destroyed by nuclear war. Some of the others follow, but then the portal phases out and they can’t get back. Things just get worse after that. They run across a rocket that has landed to escape pursuing enemies, bearing scientists who survived the war, and many android “slaves.” The time travellers are invited to escape when the ship is again ready to blast off - but just before that happens, the scientits’ enemy returns and fires on the sitting-duck ship. A very bad day for the scientists turns terminal at that point, and the 20th-century Earthlings barely escape with their skins.
description_for_label: A time travel experiment that was supposed to produce a window into time turns out to be a portal instead. One of the experimenters steps through into a not-too-distant-future world that has been destroyed by nuclear war. Some of the others follow, but then the portal phases out and they can’t get back. Things just get worse after that. They run across a rocket that has landed to escape pursuing enemies, bearing scientists who survived the war, and many android “slaves.” The time travellers are invited to escape when the ship is again ready to blast off - but just before that happens, the scientits’ enemy returns and fires on the sitting-duck ship. A very bad day for the scientists turns terminal at that point, and the 20th-century Earthlings barely escape with their skins.

results.title: The Thing From Another World
results.brief_description: Scientists and US Air Force officials fend off a blood-thirsty alien organism while investigating at a remote arctic outpost.

constellations_other.name: The Kubrick connection
constellations_other.description: The visual effects for Blade Runner drew on a number of techniques from other iconic films, including two of Stanley Kubrick's masterpieces.

results.description: Scientists and US Air Force officials fend off a blood-thirsty alien organism while investigating at a remote arctic outpost.
